description: React component for the Dashboard page, displaying and filtering notes fetched from a Supabase database with both server-side and client-side filtering logic.

methods.name: Dashboard({ session, onUpload, refreshKey })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of notes with server-side filtering, fallback to client filtering if server filtering fails. Handles loading state and user interactions.

ctags.name: Dashboard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Dashboard({ session, onUpload, refreshKey }) {$/
